bcbioRNASeq 0.2.7

General Arguments

Source: R/general.R
general.Rd

General Arguments

Arguments

object

Object.
i

An integer or numeric scalar.
value

Value to assign.
x

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
alpha

scalar numeric. Adjusted P value ("alpha") cutoff.
color

ggproto/ScaleDiscrete or NULL. Desired ggplot2 color scale. Must supply discrete values. When set to NULL, the default ggplot2 color palette will be used. If manual color definitions are desired, we recommend using ggplot2::scale_color_manual(). To set the discrete color palette globally, use options(bcbio.discrete.color = scale_color_viridis_d()).
counts

matrix. Normalized counts.
dir

string. Local directory path.
direction

string. Plot "both", "up", or "down" directions.
fill

ggproto/ScaleDiscrete or NULL. Desired ggplot2 fill scale. Must supply discrete values. When set to NULL, the default ggplot2 color palette will be used. If manual color definitions are desired, we recommend using ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(). To set the discrete fill palette globally, use options(bcbio.discrete.fill = scale_fill_viridis_d()).
flip

boolean. Flip x and y axes. Recommended for quality control plots containing many samples.
gene2symbol

data.frame. Gene-to-symbol mappings. Must contain the columns geneID and geneName.
genes

character. Genes to include. These must match the rownames of the object. It is best practice to use the stable gene identifiers from Ensembl (e.g. "ENSG00000000003") and not the gene symbols.
headerLevel

scalar integer (1-7). R Markdown header level.
interestingGroups

character. Groups of interest that define the samples. If left unset, defaults to sampleName.
label

boolean. Superimpose sample text labels on the plot.
legend

boolean. Show plot legend.
lfcThreshold

scalar numeric. Log fold change ratio (base 2) cutoff threshold.
limit

scalar numeric. Threshold to denote on the plot, using a dashed line.
minCounts

scalar integer. Minimum number of counts per gene in the counts matrix.
normalized

string. Which normalization method to apply:

  • "tpm": Transcripts per million (tximport).

  • "tmm": edgeR trimmed mean of M-values. Calculated on the fly.

  • "rlog": DESeq2 log2 regularized log transformation.

  • "vst": DESeq2 log2 variance stabilizing transformation.
ntop

scalar integer. Number of top genes to label.
passLimit

scalar numeric. Threshold to plot pass color marker.
pointColor

string. Default point color for the plot.
results

DESeqResults.
return

string. Object class to return. Uses match.arg() internally and picks the first item in the vector by default.
samples

character or NULL. Samples to include.
sigPointColor

character. Color names for labeling upregulated and downregulated genes. Also supports a character string for labeling DEGs with the same color, regardless of direction.
subtitle

string or NULL. Plot subtitle.
title

string or NULL. Plot title.
warnLimit

scalar numeric. Threshold to plot warning color marker.
withDimnames

boolean. Whether dimnames should be applied to extracted assay elements.

Value

No value.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
